name: Don Rafael - Mexico - No. 57 Robusto
additionalNotes: Don Rafael cigars are premium mellow and smooth cigars, built for daily enjoyment. Rolled by Jose Dominguez in the Dominican Republic in the same factory that makes Victor Sinclair, Don Rafael cigars are well-made cigars priced oh-so-right. Don Rafael cigars deliver when you want something not overpowering to enjoy any time of the day. From Don Rafael Connecticut and Gold to Don Rafael Maduro and Nicaragua, any one of these handmades provides an easy draw perfect for all occasions.
